name: Idiot Sandwich
description:
Introduction

The game begins with the player being given a recipe for a dish that they need to complete. From there they are given free reign over their character inside of a large restaurant kitchen. The player is to follow the recipe, correcting gathering and preparing ingredients to make the dish as perfect as possible. The kitchen has multiple stations such as a cutting board, stove, oven, etc. When the player brings ingredients to these stations to cut, bake, or mix them, the camera briefly switches to a first-person perspective where an animation of the player preparing the food is played. The player wins the game when they successfully complete the meal, which then shows a small victory animation. Should the player not prepare the food in time or fail to follow the recipe, they will fail and the game will play a losing animation.

Known Issue

The camera  may break, when it breaks, press ALT
